meanings.definition: A type of plant belonging to the genus Selaginella.
meanings.sent1: The selaginella in the garden is a small, delicate plant.
meanings.sent2: I learned about selaginella in my botany class.
meanings.sent3: The selaginella tried to hide behind the larger plants, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: Her love for selaginella was as deep as the roots of the plant.
meanings.sent5: The selaginella's green leaves shimmered in the sunlight, captivating all who passed by.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Selaginella.
meanings.sent1: We have a variety of selaginella species in our greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: The selaginella plants are known for their unique appearance.
meanings.sent3: The selaginella plants whispered secrets to each other in the stillness of the night.
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a jungle, filled with selaginella plants of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent5: The selaginella seemed to dance in the breeze, bringing life to the garden.
